Nigeria: Ban Ki-moon on attack on #UN House in #Abuja: "This was an assault on those who devote their lives to helping others." #unblast
Ban Ki-moon says #UN House in #Abuja houses 26 humanitarian & development agencies in the #UN family. No precise figures on casualties yet.
Ban Ki-moon condemns car bomb at #UN House in #Abuja, says casualty figures are likely to be considerable.  #UNblast #Nigeria
